t: New Amazon report shows small businesses have created millions of US jobs and built thriving communities
s: Amazon is home to many unique products from small business brands around the U.S. The impact of these small businesses that sell in the Amazon store extends throughout their local communities. Beyond hiring for local jobs, independent sellers contract with local service providers, rent local office and warehouse space, and more. Independent sellers have become powerful engines of economic opportunity in communities across America...
